item.title: TideWave's Mermaid Integration: Auto-Generating Diagrams from Code
item.description:
What Changed

TideWave added support for generating Mermaid diagrams. You can now ask the agent to visualize your code, and it’ll produce the diagrams for you.

Why This Matters

Documentation is the thing you know you should do but rarely have time for. Architecture diagrams especially - they’re outdated the moment you finish drawing them.

TideWave generating these automatically changes that equation.

What I’m Using It For

Understanding Legacy Code

When I inherited an Elixir project with unclear module relationships, I asked TideWave to analyze the codebase and show me how the contexts interact.
